# validation

**Instance Property**

The validation dataset.

## Declaration

```swift
var validation: MLTextClassifier.ModelParameters.ValidationData { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.createml/documentation/CreateML/MLTextClassifier/ModelParameters-swift.struct/ValidationData-swift.enum/split(strategy:)] with the [doc://com.apple.createml/documentation/CreateML/MLSplitStrategy/automatic] split strategy``, which automatically generates the validation dataset by partitioning up to 10% of the training dataset.

## Accessing parameters

- **algorithm**: The parameter’s algorithm setting.
- **language**: The parameter’s language setting.
- **maxIterations**: The maximum number of training iterations.
